cause.description:
He's gone, blow you're nose, have a tissue. Your place as the best team in North London has now been. Arise Sir Dimitar Berbatov, the mantle is now ours!!
1. Arse-Anal Fans, Get Over It!!
2. You're No Longer As Good As The Spurs
3. ...I'm Still Laughing!!
cause.mission: To Help Dry The Eyes Of All Arse-Anal Fans Around The World
cause.name: Bye Bye Thierry Henry!! Arse-Anal Are Finished!!
